description.p: 發現一個將Octopress的文章轉移到Wordpress的方法(使用python script)

ol.li: 首先參考並新增一 rss.xml到source中(修改Line 7: href=“自己的Octopress 網址”)

pre.code:
--- layout: nil --- <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <rss xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/" version="2.0"> <channel> <atom:link rel="hub" href="http://pubsubhubbub.appspot.com" xmlns:atom="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom"/> <title>{{ site.title | xml_escape }}</title> <generator>Octopress</generator> <link>{{ site.url }}</link>
{% for post in site.posts limit: 20 %} <item> <title>{{ post.title | xml_escape }}</title> <description>{{ post.content | expand_urls: site.url | cdata_escape }}</description> <link>{{ site.url }}{{ post.url }}</link> <pubDate>{{ post.date | date_to_xmlschema }}</pubDate> <guid>{{ site.url }}{{ post.id }}</guid> </item> {% endfor %} </channel> </rss>

description.p: 原出處:http://5minutenpause.com/blog/2012/06/08/rss-finally-working-again/

li.p: Octopress使用的是atom.xml 所以要修改_config.yml中subscribe_rss:“/rss.xml”
在Terminal中執行jekyll generate然後就會將Octopress中的文章由atom.xml轉成到public/rss.xml.xml，然後再由Wordpress後台Import rss就可以了！

description.p: # Clean out caches: .pygments-cache, .gist-cache, .sass-cache

# list tasks
# Create a new page in source/(filename)/index.markdown
# Begin a new post in source/_posts
# preview the site in a web browser
# deploy public directory to github pages
# Deploy website via rsync
# Update configurations to support publishing to root or sub directory
# Set up _deploy folder and deploy branch for Github Pages deployment
# Move source to source.old, install source theme updates, replace source/_includes/navigation.ht…
# Move sass to sass.old, install sass theme updates, replace sass/custom with sass.old/custom
# Watch the site and regenerate when it changes
Simple Voting System [http://salty-cliffs-4222.herokuapp.com/]

description.h4: Hi this is my first blog post on github using Octopress.
